name: Wind Sprints
description: Short distance all-out sprints for speed, power, and anaerobic conditioning.
instructions: Mark out a short distance, typically 40-100 yards. This will be your starting position.
Begin by accelerating as quickly as possible from a standing start, driving with the legs and pumping the arms.
Sprint at maximum effort for the entire distance, maintaining proper running form with high knees and explosive foot strikes.
Once you reach the end, walk back to recover, then repeat for the desired number of intervals.
